name: 虛擬實境媒體研究
description: 本課程教授虛擬實境媒體在不同場景中的應用與相關研究,其中含蓋了教育科技,醫學,醫療復健,營銷廣告,遊戲產業,以及影視創作;課程並教授心理學/社會科學研究取徑,以及數據分析/生理心理分析在虛擬實境媒體研究中的運用,修習本課程的學生將能應用虛擬實境媒體至社會教育相關的實踐及研究中。
goals: 學習虛擬實境媒體在不同場景的應用與相關研究
學習心理學/社會科學研究取徑與數據分析/生理心理分析在虛擬實境媒體研究中的運用
學習應用虛擬實境媒體至教育科技, 醫學,醫療復健,營銷廣告,遊戲產業,以及影視創作的實踐
syllabus:
Week 1: Introduction to Virtual Reality Media and the Course

Week 2: Introduction to VR-related hardware/software

Week 3: Students experience virtual reality media

Week 4: Psychology/Social Science Research Approach and VR Research

Week 5: Application of Data Analysis and Psycho-physiological Analysis in VR Research

Week 6: Application Scenarios and Research of Educational Technology (1)

Week 7: Application Scenarios and Research of Educational Technology (2)

Week 8: Application and research of VR and medical practice (1)

Week 9: Application and research of VR and medical practice (2)

Week 10: Mid-term assessment

Week 11: Application and research of medical rehabilitation scenarios (1)

Week 12: Application and research of medical rehabilitation scenarios (2)

Week 13: Game and Marketing Advertising Application and Research

Week 14: VR film and television creation application and research

Week 15: The future development and research direction of virtual reality media

Week 16: Final assessment
